and enclose=

se from it surrounded in a flaming 
glow of chaochitan energy. It then open=
ed a mental link to frostbite.

????: "Frostbite... contact those who have =
contacted us about an 
alliance. Tell them to meet us in what will come to =

ked to

With that the=
